text: When Vancouver’s Arbutus Station opens in 2027, it will anchor the Millenium Line’s new western terminus as a prominent example of ambitious transit-oriented development (TOD) in a mature neighborhood.
Arbutus Station is in many ways already a complete community, characterized by an active commercial corridor along Broadway, strong pedestrian activity, and a station that enables multimodal travel.
The challenge will be ensuring that the area’s affordable housing stock and many amenities remain despite densification, so it can continue to be a home for people of all income levels.
